member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.SlideView.Commands.SlideViewCommandService.ExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.SlideView.Commands.SlideViewCommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to find the command, associated with the specified Id and to perform its Execute routine, using the provided parameter.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command is successfully executed, false otherwise.

member.name: M:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.SlideView.Commands.SlideViewCommandService.CanExecuteCommand(Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.SlideView.Commands.SlideViewCommandId,System.Object)
member.summary: Determines whether the command, associated with the specified Id can be executed given the parameter provided.
member.param: The parameter that is passed to the CanExecute and Execute methods of the command.
member.returns: True if the command can be executed, false otherwise.

member.name: E:Telerik.XamarinForms.Primitives.RadScrollView.TopHeaderUnloaded
member.summary: An event needed to work around a peculiarity in UWP where the TopHeader is unloaded while being shown on screen.
